articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says former interim boss Ralf Rangnick was "absolutely right" about the club needing "open-heart" surgery.

articles.description: Former world snooker champion Ray Reardon has died after a battle against cancer at the age of 91.
articles.title: Ray Reardon: Six-times world snooker champion dies aged 91
